results.title: Fatal fetal outcome with the combined use of valsartan and atenolol.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To report a case of anhydramnios, @DISEASE_Lung_agenesis @DISEASE_MESH:C562992 @@@pulmonary hypoplasia@@@, very small placenta, and @DISEASE_Fetal_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D005313 @@@fetal death@@@ in a pregnancy complicated by chronic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ that had been treated through the first 24 weeks of gestation with @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

results.title: Hypertension in hypoglycemic diabetics treated with beta-adrenergic antagonists.
results.text_hl: Placebo, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (100 mg/day), and @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ (80 mg b.i.d.) were administered to 12 @CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@-treated @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetics@@@ for 1 week in a double-blind, randomized, crossover fashion with a 2-week washout between treatments.
